author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: Surprisingly detailed
review:
Opening;

The monthly mini model build BBQ is a very detailed design with some very nice part inclusions .

The build-

The build features a 2×4 black slope for a lid , a hotdog , a chicken drumstick , a hotdog bun , a printed control panel on a 1×4 dark blueish grey tile and a very nice grille build using a clip and three 1×2 jumpers to hold the food along with many 1×2 sliver grill tiles to complete the look . The lower half has a modified 1×2 black brick with a clip on the side for a gas canister I believe and two pairs of small wheels to roll it around .

In conclusion-

this is surprisingly detailed and can interact with your figures well in a Lego city I personally own two of it and they work surprisingly well in numbers . I would recommend it to any people with a Lego city of anyone who appreciates a detailed small build .
